Literature.Title: Effects of Substituting Arginine by Lysine in Bovine Lactoferricin Derived Peptides: Pursuing Production Lower Costs, Lower Hemolysis, and Sustained Antimicrobial Activity
Literature.Author: Cárdenas-Martínez KJ, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=36µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MBC=72µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=36µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=36µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=143µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=143µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=143µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=>143µM)
